column5: 1930'S downstairs two bedroom stone charm (spacious, 1300sqft) in desirable historic neighborhood nestled in City Center. Restaurants, shops, Trinity U. within walking distance. Short drive to FIESTA! (April),Dtwn/River Walk, Quarry, Pearl, King Williams dist. Wifi is now available on the property.  Recent description from one of our guests \
column8: CHARMING HISTORIC Near RiverWalk&DT, Pearl w/ wifi
